summary: replace Daedric_Bow\'s model with the epic SiegeBow\'s
descriptionHtml:
!! ===you should install \"Siege Bow Collection\" mod first===!!

1.this is not a standalone mod,just changed the daedric bow\'s mesh link to Siege Bow\'s.
so you should install \"Siege Bow Collection\" mod first,
or it will not work.

2.to get more info about the siege bow,please visit the \"Siege Bow Collection\" description page.

Siege Bow Collection:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12034

2.it works in my game,if there is any bug,
please let me know,maybe I can fix it.
author: zxdong262
